org.apache.solr.handler

Interface NestedRequestHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdminHandlers, AnalysisRequestHandlerBase, BlobHandler, CollectionsHandler, ConfigSetsHandler, ContentStreamHandlerBase, CoreAdminHandler, DocumentAnalysisRequestHandler, DumpRequestHandler, FieldAnalysisRequestHandler, FileFloatSource.ReloadCacheRequestHandler, InfoHandler, LoggingHandler, LukeRequestHandler, MoreLikeThisHandler, NotFoundRequestHandler, PingRequestHandler, PluginInfoHandler, PropertiesRequestHandler, RealTimeGetHandler, ReplicationHandler, RequestHandlerBase, SchemaHandler, SearchHandler, SecurityConfHandler, SegmentsInfoRequestHandler, ShowFileRequestHandler, SolrConfigHandler, SolrInfoMBeanHandler, StandardRequestHandler, StreamHandler, SystemInfoHandler, ThreadDumpHandler, UpdateRequestHandler, ZookeeperInfoHandler

    public interface NestedRequestHandler
    An interface for RequestHandlers need to handle all paths under its registered path

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SolrRequestHandler getSubHandler(String subPath)
      Return a Requestandler to handle a subpath from the path this handler is registered.

    • Method Detail

      • getSubHandler

        SolrRequestHandler getSubHandler(String subPath)
        Return a Requestandler to handle a subpath from the path this handler is registered.
